mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sa_upms_resource( resource_id, resource_name, parent_resource_id, app_root_resource, resource_url, resource_type, http_method, action_type, siblings_index, resource_icon, index_page, create_time, create_by ) VALUES ( #{resourceId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{resourceName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentResourceId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appRootResource, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{resourceUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceType, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{httpMethod, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actionType, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{siblingsIndex, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resourceIcon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indexPage, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{createTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy, jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sa_upms_resource WHERE resource_id = #{resourceId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT a.resource_id resourceId, a.resource_name resourceName, a.parent_resource_id parentResourceId, a.app_root_resource appRootResource, a.resource_url resourceUrl, a.resource_type resourceType, a.http_method httpMethod, a.action_type actionType, a.siblings_index siblingsIndex, a.resource_icon resourceIcon, a.index_page indexPage, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime, a.create_by createBy, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') updateTime, a.update_by updateBy FROM sa_upms_resource a WHERE a.resource_id = #{resourceId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT a.resource_id resourceId, a.resource_name resourceName, a.parent_resource_id parentResourceId, a.app_root_resource appRootResource, a.resource_url resourceUrl, a.resource_type resourceType, a.http_method httpMethod, a.action_type actionType, a.siblings_index siblingsIndex, a.resource_icon resourceIcon, a.index_page indexPage, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime, a.create_by createBy, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') updateTime, a.update_by updateBy FROM sa_upms_resource a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.resource_id ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM sa_upms_resource a WHERE 1=1
mapper.update: UPDATE sa_upms_resource a SET a.index_page = 0 WHERE 1=1

SELECT a.resource_id resourceId, a.resource_name resourceName, a.parent_resource_id parentResourceId, a.app_root_resource appRootResource, a.resource_url resourceUrl, a.resource_type resourceType, a.http_method httpMethod, a.action_type actionType, a.siblings_index siblingsIndex, a.resource_icon resourceIcon, a.index_page indexPage, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime, a.create_by createBy, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') updateTime, a.update_by updateBy
,(SELECT count(*) FROM sa_upms_role_resource b WHERE a.resource_id = b.resource_id) inuse
FROM sa_upms_resource a WHERE 1=1
AND a.action_type = #{actionType, jdbcType=TINYINT}
ORDER BY a.resource_id ASC

SELECT a.resource_url resourceUrl, a.http_method httpMethod, rr.role_code roleCode FROM sa_upms_resource a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.role_code, c.resource_id FROM sa_upms_role b, sa_upms_role_resource c WHERE c.role_id = b.role_id) rr ON (a.resource_id = rr.resource_id) WHERE IFNULL(a.resource_url,'') != '' ORDER BY a.resource_url ASC
